alert.note: Alert for Sherman (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 01 at 7:31PM CDT by NWS Amarillo
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Sherman County through 800 PM CDT... At 730 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 4 miles south of Texhoma, or 18 miles northeast of Stratford, moving south at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Texhoma. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
